lenders.name: Elaine

lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: The James Gang

lenders.occupational_info: We service Optical equipment that is used to check your eyes and vision.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It is one way to help someone make more of their life and enrich it. It is one thing all of us can do....help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a contractual management company that provides services around the world.

lenders.name: amanda
lenders.loan_because: i can! while i wish i had more money to be creative with, i think it's amazing to see how far just a little bit can stretch in someone else's hands...
lenders.occupational_info: i create metal and/or porcelain crowns, bridges, and veneers for the dental field...

lenders.name: Shana

lenders.name: Victoria & Louis

We are our brothers keeper -

lenders.name: Dina

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: We should all share our blessings with others in need.

lenders.name: Vicky
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes what seems like a relatively small amount to me can make huge difference in the life of someone else - and that impacts many more people in turn.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: What a way to help someone, help themselves!

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: I was so excited to hear about the opportunity to help others so significantly with so little.  I have been helped by others in my life and hope to pass on my gifts.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with patients who are injured in their jobs with medical care and returning to work.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I was born in South Africa, moved to the US when I was a teen and feel that this is an opportunity for me to give back to Africa.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: We BOOMERS have had it so good for so long ... time to help someone else.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I have been blessed by having opportunities in my country.  I wish to help others reach their dreams, one donation at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher, and I love what I do!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people.

lenders.name: A E

lenders.name: Bernadine
lenders.loan_because: I have 5 beautiful grandchildren and hopefully teach them about giving and learning about all cultures.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a life long learner  in my senior years I have only touch the beginning of my journey.

lenders.name: Michelle

lenders.occupational_info: I book travel for people who want to see the world.

lenders.name: Malena
lenders.loan_because:
I know I can make a huge difference to a life. This is an awesome idea that I want everyone to know about. 

Se que puedo tener impacto en la vida de alguien. Esta es una idea genial y quiero que todo el mundo sepa de Kiva.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I am a woman trying to build a small business. I understand the need for help, to try and achieve a successful business
lenders.occupational_info: I have a homebased travel business.  I love it !  I am having a blast and my goal is to make more money so I can help more people!

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business and now want to help others become successful with their own businesses too.
lenders.occupational_info: I design projects such as advertisements, newsletters, brochures, posters, websites, etc.

lenders.name: Evelyn
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: Its a wonderful way to share with others because I am so blessed.

lenders.name: Kerri

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I care -- it's that simple.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sell and buy houses and land.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone less fortunate achieve their hopes and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work as an intensive care unit nurse, caring for the sickest patients.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: God has been very good to me.  I believe His admonition to Abraham--"I have blessed you so that you will be a blessing to others"--applies to me as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse working in an AIDS clinic.  I have visited Africa twice and saw what AIDS is doing to the people there.  I also witnessed the amazing resilience of the African people.  This is one small way I can encourage them.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I would not have been able to grow into the person that I am without the assistant of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help pharmaceutical and device companies get the clinical trials completed for submission to FDA for approval.  I am also an artist & work on providing inspirational art to people who have terminal or chronic illnesses.

lenders.name: Edith
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people help them selves by lending a hand-up not a hand -out.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide  drug-free health care to eleviate needless suffering from chronic joint and muscle pain.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a teacher because I like working with kids. Specifically I like working with children with special needs.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Distributor of over 1 million different promotional items that can be decorated with your logo or slogan.  Clients are businesses who wish to promote their business or launch a new product.

lenders.name: uscity.net
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we are all here to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a US website directory with links to businesses plus an online phone book with white pages, and yellow pages, weather, news, sports, a hotel finder, real estate and apartment finder, free credit reports, national and local parks, movie times and much more,

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a WONDERFUL organization and when I learned about it I knew immediately that I had to get involved. It literally is the gift that keeps on giving.  I've loaned out the same $50 I started with 18 times and am starting to add more each year.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and must return graciously to people who  can grow and gain independence
lenders.occupational_info: full time caregiver, in our home,   for the elderly. We presently have 22.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: It's more fun to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of children who are in state custody. Something has happened in their lives that they were not safe at home.

lenders.name: Christina & Scott
lenders.loan_because: We feel blessed to be happy , healthy and have jobs that afford us the ability to share with others.

lenders.name: Donovan
lenders.loan_because: It helps people and gets me service hours to graduate.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, and am trying to raise money to help you guys by playing music.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: I have owned and operated a small buisiness, and understand how hard it is to get the buisiness up and running.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair large earth moving equipment

lenders.name: Martin and Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: We want to feed Him when He is hungry, give Him a drink when He is thirsty, and invite Him in when He is a stranger.
lenders.occupational_info: Martin is physician training in internal medicine and Kimberly is teaching their son how to be good.

lenders.name: pam
lenders.loan_because: because...
lenders.occupational_info: worked in tv production after college. then was a senior medical editor for product liability lawsuits - all death & gloom. later, i drove a truck for an electric utility so i could write at work. now,  i do what i want...write & take photographs.

lenders.name: Niamh
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business in 2001. Then in 2006 I started a networking group in my community to help other small businesses grow, profit, and provide for their families. It gives me great joy now to be able to help someone else grow their business. Thank you for the opportunity and congratulations to the organizers of Kiva !
lenders.occupational_info: I assist  individuals and families with plans on how to save money for their needs now and for their future

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is something Christ wants me to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I write documents to help users understand how to use our software product.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because:
At the risk of sounding like a cliche' No one can do everything, everyone can do something, and if we all do something , it WILL change the world. It sounds too simple to be effective in a big complicated world, but it just may be that it is the ONLY effective way to change the world. 
I believe with all of my heart that if you are going to walk this planet and use the resources , you MUST give something back and if all you have is a dime, because the rent is due and the car is in the shop, and the hospital bills are pouring in, then give that dime. Just give it. It will change your life. The very best way that I have found to survive the tough times is to do something for someone else. You don't have to be able to do some huge thing in order to be effective and make a difference in someones life. For that reason, I am glad that I found Kiva.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help those less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Ear, Nose, and Throat surgeon

lenders.name: Heather and Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest software maker in the world, Microsoft.  As does my employer, my family and I believe strongly in helping those in need around the world.

lenders.name: dianne
lenders.loan_because: i like to help people in need

lenders.name: Felice
lenders.occupational_info: ultrasound tech

lenders.name: TomFam
lenders.loan_because: We can and must!
lenders.occupational_info: giving back

lenders.occupational_info:
I'm retired, but recently became involved with Soroptimist International of Santa Rosa.  See my blog at:
http://sisr-gerryruth.blogspot.com/

i detail cars on a Saturday and a Tuesday Morning from 6.00 am to 10.00 am

lenders.name: Tee

lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3-5 year olds. They are energetic and curious and funny and I sleep very well at night. :) I am sure they are just the same all over the world.

lenders.occupational_info: My most important job is Mother to 3 boys and sometimes Foster Mother to many more. My paying job is at a credit card company.

lenders.name: Lori

lenders.occupational_info: Helping people improve their families and their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I retired last April from the Texas Department of Human Services where I managed two Food Stamp,Medicaid, and TANF eligibility determination offices. I have seen first hand what can happen when people are given a chance.

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two young boys.

lenders.occupational_info: I am nurse & am fortunate to be able to help people feel better. I hate to see anyone suffer!

lenders.name: Doc

lenders.occupational_info: Everyday all day, I am privileged to help people with health problems related to their spine and other joints of the body.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve there lives.

lenders.name: Chris & Patti
lenders.loan_because: We love helping, and we are fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I run a small business myself in addition to working a full time pharmaceutical sales job for the worlds largest pharma company.  No sale makes you feel the same as knowing you are helping a motivated entrepreneur in need get one step closer to what we know as "the american dream", it helps me sleep at night :) !
lenders.occupational_info: I help people by visiting doctors offices and hospitals and giving them free samples of our drugs for their pts. in need.  I also try to educate the doctors as to the differences between drugs they are using (how well they work, cost to patient, side effects, etc...)  As a hobby and source of extra income I started my own website as a way of marketing the horses that I am breeding and training on my 20 acre farm.  I try to sell a couple horses a year that are show-jumping horses for a little extra money to pay the farm bills.

lenders.name: Scott & Donna
lenders.loan_because: We like to give a helping hand, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Leslie

lenders.occupational_info: At the moment I am unemployed

lenders.occupation: General Electric Nuclear Fuels, PMQC Inspector
lenders.loan_because: My mother is from Mexico and I have seen firsthand how poor some of her family is and the Mexican population overall.  Had she not met my father, who was in the military, she would very likely be living the same kind of life.  I have been blessed with a good job and feel the need to share my good fortune.  I wish all the business men and women the very best and hope you will have a better life with the help of Kiva. org.  God bless you all.  Glenda

lenders.name: Beata
lenders.loan_because: I am too lucky, too blessed to have everything I already do. It is time to share it with those who have little or sometimes nothing at all. And it really does feel better to give than to receive :)

lenders.name: craig

lenders.occupational_info: i write and create greeting cards that fall under the category of adult humor.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: It's a great feeling!
lenders.occupational_info: I work on medical software.

lenders.name: Donna

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.occupational_info: i park, fuel, and tow planes. then on the weekends i work behind the desk at the airport being a customer service rep.

lenders.name: myra

i want to help. 
its always a great feeling to know you're helping someone make their dreams come true or/and to know at least that,  that person is able to put food on the table for her/his family.
lenders.occupational_info: work in an acute care hospital where i care and advocate for patients needs.

lenders.name: Jon

lenders.name: Alnore

lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently finishing my bachelor degree in anthropology and hope to get a job as an ESL instructor in Japan and then grad school.

lenders.occupational_info: i provide  all levels of  health care to     children and adults.

lenders.name: Stephan & Ronlyn
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending has proven to be a seriously productive and positive way for an individual to reach out and help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do research, and write about my exploration of that  part of us unlimited by space or time. My papers, books, and electronic media can found at my personal website listed below. I also study and write about the trends that are shaping the cultures of the world, and our collective future. My daily web publication on this aspect of my work can be found at:
www.schwartzreport.net. My bi-monthly essays appear in the journal Explore:  www.explorejournal.com/content/schwartz

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Luke 6:20-21 “Blessed are you who are poor, for yours is the kingdom of God. Blessed are you who hunger now, for you shall be satisfied. Blessed are you who weep now, for you shall laugh.”
lenders.occupational_info: Jesus, help me do your will, promote your glory and advance your kingdom.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Just because a person is born in a particular country, or into a particular family, should not condemn him to poverty for life.
lenders.occupational_info: currently without employment--by choice

lenders.name: Lorie
lenders.loan_because: I can.  If one has, one should give.  I have, therefore, I give.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding.  I get to help people everyday.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who try.
lenders.occupational_info: I helped people travel to visit other countries and meet the wonderful people in the world

lenders.name: Kiri

lenders.occupational_info: I am an Assistant Manager for lululemon athletica in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. lululemon athletica specializes in yoga-inspired athletic apparel.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Everyone was born with a dream, but not everyone was born into money.  Reality is simply the limitations we set upon our dreams.  Kiva removes these limitations, and creates a whole new reality.

lenders.name: Craig

lenders.occupational_info: I help design new communications products that make it easier for people to communicate worldwide.

lenders.occupational_info: creative

lenders.name: Nita
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying forward those blessings I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a preachers wife and help with teaching and training others.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I hope it will do some good.

lenders.name: Kathy & David
lenders.occupation: Medical Office Management / Small Business Owners
lenders.loan_because: Because we can. We love the stories and the drive that people have to succeed.  Kiva gives us an opportunity to share some of our success with others in need of a helping hand.

lenders.name: molly
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy passing on blessings to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I've taught elementary school in a rural area of Mississippi for the past eighteen years.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: As a Canadians we have so many advantages that are unimaginable to so many people. It is my honour and privilege to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Edd
lenders.loan_because: I think that no matter how difficult life is for us, others have it even more difficult.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in Kenya, and this is a great way to help my home country
lenders.occupational_info: I am a career coach, helping professionals managing their careers. I work principally in New York and Washington DC with the top lawyers in the USA

lenders.name: Mina
lenders.loan_because: Well it says it right there on the main page.  They are "loans that change lives".  What an easy way to leave a positive mark behind.  Everyone who can should be doing this! I believe that people don't need a hand out, they need a hand up and others to believe in them and they will know what to do to better their own lives.  KIVA allows me to make a positive difference in the lives of many people around the world, while at the same time letting people go after their own goals with their own hard work.  My brothers let me know about KIVA and one of them sent me an invitation and I have been loving it ever since!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital for the computer department.  I work with a lot of great people in my department and at the hospital.  My workplace also changes people's lives :) Guess it's trend for me. he heh ;)

lenders.loan_because: It feels great to connect with the larger world.

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.loan_because: We all can make a differance ,even though we think it is small
lenders.occupational_info: I own a storage facility. It is rows of rooms for people to put in their possesions if they don't have room in their home

lenders.name: amy jane.
lenders.loan_because: “What we do for ourselves dies with us.  What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.”  - Albert Pine
lenders.occupational_info: i am a cloud-computing marketeer for a boston-based technology company.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because: As a second-generation Mexican immigrant, I'm very grateful for what I have achieved through the contributions of others.  It's my social obligation to "pay it forward" and help others reach their greatest potential by helping to remove barriers in their paths.
lenders.occupational_info: I help migrant agricultural farmworkers improve their lives and our political systems by empowering workers through client-directed education, community building, policy making and legal strategizing.

lenders.name: Shea & Cleo
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone needs a helping hand. 
It is not a hand-out 
but a hand-up!!!
:-)
lenders.occupational_info:
Shea works with electronics and 
Cleo (wife) works with at-risk children

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I help the sick and injured.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: The only way the world will work is if everyone supports everyone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired civil rights lawyer, and now I am a writer and a model.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: ...I can.  I loan to the fish sellers because my mom is a fisherwoman.  And I loan to the vegetable mongers because I wish I were among them.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: joey
lenders.loan_because: ...I am part of the most affluent culture in the history of humanity...
lenders.occupational_info: I capture people's stories and share them with as many people as I can

lenders.name: Chrissy
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share, and so it just makes sense.

lenders.name: Natalee
lenders.loan_because: "Every mikkle mek a muckle" - Jamaican proverb which means "every little bit counts."
